content: Listen to this funeral song I am ready to sing about you, family of Israel:
The  says this to the family of Israel:
Because of Israel’s sins this is what the Lord, the  God of Heaven’s Armies, says:
Woe to those who wish for the day of the !
Why do you want the ’s day of judgment to come?
It will bring darkness, not light.
as if a man ran from a lion only to meet a bear,
leaned his hand against the wall,
and was bitten by a poisonous snake.
Don’t you realize the ’s day of judgment will bring darkness, not light—
